WorkItem.Description:
I have created a msmq cluster with a clustered DTC service on windows 2008 R2 machine.
I have created a transactional queue on clustered instance added my id on security tab, however kept the "Authenticated" option "checked"
Published a message with "durable=true, exactlyOnce=true, useActiveDirectory=false & security mode = "transport" & msmqAuthenticationMode = WindowsDomain" in the binding. 
After this I am unable to publish a message from a windows 2008 machine & at client side the message moves to transactional dead letter queue with error as "the signature is invalid" error
 
I tried setting up the "Authenticated option as unchecked did not help.
Then i set authenticated unchecked and instead set the "security mode = None" and then i could publish message.
 
Can you please guide me in this?
WorkItem.Summary: I would like to see a video which explains how to configure msmq cross machine and with windows authentication and publish messages across machines
